```{python}
import sys
```

```{python}

import pandas as pd
print('pandas version', pd.__version__)
```

## Reading from parquet

```{python}
df = pd.read_parquet("data/Combined_Flights_2022.parquet")
```


## get first 3
```{python}
df.head(3)
```

## get last 3
```{python}
df.tail(3)
```

## get ramdon 5

```{python}
df.sample(5, random_state=42)
```


## get columns names
```{python}
df.columns
```

## get row index
```{python}
df.index
```

## get long info 
```{python}
df.info()
```



## get short info 
```{python}
df.info(verbose=False)
```


## summary of numeric column
```{python}
df.describe()
```


## summary of categorical column
```{python}
df[["Airline"]].describe()
```
